    • 方法详细资料

      • allowCashout

        void allowCashout(Context context,
                java.math.BigDecimal actualCashout)
                  throws ApplicationException
        When cashout is allowed for current operator, below condition will be checked:
        1. cashout limit
        2. whether exceeds the cashout day level
        参数:
        context - The context of cashout transaction.
        actualCashout - The actual amount of cashout.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • allowSale

        void allowSale(Transaction context,
             BaseTicket ticket)
               throws ApplicationException
        Verify whether a merchant can sale a given game.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • allowPayout

        void allowPayout(Context respCtx,
               Game game,
               PayoutLevelAllowRequest[] levelAllowRequests,
               java.math.BigDecimal actualPayout)
                 throws ApplicationException
        Whether a merchant can perform payout, includes:
        1. the merchant's payout limit
        2. the allowed prize level of a given game
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of payout transaction.
        game - THe game which will be payout.
        levelAllowRequests - The request DTO contains the requested prize levels. If is null, the prize level check will be ignored.
        actualPayout - The actual payout amount
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • getMerchant

        Merchant getMerchant(long merchantId)
                     throws ApplicationException
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • getMerchantByOperator

        Merchant getMerchantByOperator(java.lang.String operatorId,
                             boolean forUpdate)
                               throws ApplicationException
        Lookup merchant by operator. A operator can be allocated to only one merchant.
        参数:
        operatorId - The id of operator.
        forUpdate - Whether lock the returned merchant entity.
        返回:
        the merchant which manages the operator.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • update

        void update(Merchant merchant)
            throws ApplicationException
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • supportedGameType

        java.util.List<GameType> supportedGameType(long merchantId)
                                           throws ApplicationException
        Find all supported game types of given merchant.
        参数:
        merchantId - The merchant to which the operator is assigned.
        返回:
        all supported game types.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business related exception.

      • getCashoutPass

        CashOutPassDto getCashoutPass(Context respCtx,
                            CashOutPassDto topupDto)
                              throws ApplicationException
        get cash out password
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
